s.text: Most presidents don't give a shit who wins or loses, and just cause huge traffic jams and inconveniences to real fans with their Secret Service brigades.
It took me a while to get used to waiting behind someone on line at the coffee shop near work who ordered a hazelnut-strawberry latte, decaf, with skim milk.
Granted, I live in New York, but my many Democratic friends are all backing Bradley.
